name: Alpha Tester: Developer's Desktop
description:
Search through files and conversations to solve the puzzles in Alpha Tester! Meant to be played in conjunction with https://cmd16.itch.io/alpha-tester-developers-desktop: that's where you'll use the clues you find in this game.

Known bugs

  • I forgot to make the scripts folder in the Code_final folder clickable. This means you cannot read Game.gd. If you could, you would find the missing parentheses on line 17, so 17 is the solution for the first puzzle.
  • If you click on Wall.tscn in Code_final folder, you cannot close that page. You will need to quit the game and reopen.

Credits

  • Catherine DeJager: programming, sfx, voice acting
  • Rosko Vair: music
